original_text: David was in his strong safe place. A group of Philistine soldiers had made their home in Bethlehem.
korean_text: 그 때에 다윗은 산성에 있고 그 때에 블레셋 사람의 요새는 베들레헴에 있는지라

sentences.original_text: David was in his strong safe place.
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗은 그의 강력하고 안전한 장소에 있었다.

sentences.original_text: had made their home in Bethlehem.
